cards.title: Putin says he reached 'understandings' with Trump over end of Ukraine war
cards.summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin says he reached "understandings" with US President Donald Trump over the end of the Ukraine war.

cards.title: Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida killed in Gaza, Israel says
cards.summary: A Palestinian spokesman has been killed in an Israeli air strike in Gaza, officials say, in a joint statement.

cards.title: Mob burns Nigerian woman to death for alleged blasphemy
cards.summary: Police in Nigeria have condemned the killing of a woman after being accused of blasphemy.
